  • Method Details

    • sendIndividualMessage

      public IndividualMessageEntity sendIndividualMessage(IndividualMessageSendDto individualMessageSendDto) throws UserNotFoundException
      Sends an individual message. This method converts the provided DTO into an entity, sets the current time as the sent time, marks the message as not viewed, and persists the entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      individualMessageSendDto - the DTO containing message details
      Returns:
      the created IndividualMessageEntity
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the sender or recipient is not found

    • getIndividualMessages

      public List<IndividualMessageGetDto> getIndividualMessages(String senderId, String recipientId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves individual messages between a sender and a recipient.
      Parameters:
      senderId - the ID of the sender
      recipientId - the ID of the recipient
      Returns:
      a list of IndividualMessageGetDto
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the sender or recipient is not found

    • getFilteredMessages

      public IndividualMessageGetPaginatedDto getFilteredMessages(String userId, String type, int page, int pageSize, jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo) throws UserNotFoundException, InputValidationException
      Retrieves paginated individual messages filtered by type.
      This method checks if the user exists, and based on the type of messages ("sent" or "inbox"), retrieves the appropriate messages from the database. It then converts the message entities to DTOs, calculates the total number of messages, and returns a paginated DTO containing the messages and total count.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      type - the type of messages ("sent" or "inbox")
      page - the page number for pagination
      pageSize - the number of messages per page
      uriInfo - the URI info for additional filtering
      Returns:
      a paginated DTO of messages
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the message type is invalid
      InputValidationException

    • markMessagesAsRead

      public boolean markMessagesAsRead(List<Long> messageIds)
      Marks messages as read.
      Parameters:
      messageIds - the list of message IDs to be marked as read
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • getMessagesByIds

      public List<IndividualMessageGetDto> getMessagesByIds(List<Long> messageIds)
      Retrieves messages by their IDs.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of IndividualMessageGetDto

    • convertToDto

      public IndividualMessageGetDto convertToDto(IndividualMessageEntity individualMessageEntity)
      Converts an IndividualMessageEntity object to an IndividualMessageGetDto object. This method maps the properties of the provided IndividualMessageEntity to a new IndividualMessageGetDto object. It includes the content, sender, recipient, sent time, subject, viewed status, and ID of the message.
      Parameters:
      individualMessageEntity - the IndividualMessageEntity object to be converted
      Returns:
      an IndividualMessageGetDto object with the mapped properties
